title: HOUR 2- Giannis is the Peyton Manning of the NBA & Dave Wannstedt- Sep 07, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 2- Giannis is the Peyton Manning of the NBA & Dave Wannstedt- Sep 07, 2020
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Jason Smith and Rob Parker are in for Dan and the Danettes, and the guys debate whether or not the Miami Dolphins are making a mistake starting Ryan Fitzpatrick over Tua Tagovailoa in week 1, discuss if Giannis Antetokounmpo’s history of regular season dominance followed by postseason struggles proves that he’s the Peyton Manning of the NBA, and share their thoughts on the wild story that got Novak Djokovic booted from the US Open. Plus, Super Bowl champion and FOX NFL analyst Dave Wannstedt stops by to discuss if Mitchell Trubisky or Nick Foles is the man for the job in Chicago, why he’s all-in on the Pittsburgh Steelers this season, and much more! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
